name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Fluid Dynamics
lessons.description: Explore the basic principles of fluid behavior and properties.

lessons.name: Boundary Layers and Drag
lessons.description: Understand the significance of boundary layers and aerodynamic drag.

lessons.name: Lift Generation and Airfoil Design
lessons.description: Delve into lift creation and principles of airfoil design.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Aerodynamics Fundamentals
lessons.description: Explore principles governing subsonic airflow and design considerations.

lessons.name: Supersonic Shock Waves and Mach Numbers
lessons.description: Understand shock waves, Mach numbers, and supersonic phenomena.

lessons.name: Transonic Flow and Critical Mach Number
lessons.description: Examine transonic regions and the significance of critical Mach.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamic Heating
lessons.description: Uncover the basics of aerodynamic heating and its implications.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer in Hypersonic Flight
lessons.description: Explore heat transfer challenges in hypersonic aerodynamics and beyond.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems and Design
lessons.description: Examine strategies for effective thermal protection in aerospace design..

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Load Analysis and Structural Requirements
lessons.description: Analyze loads, define structural requirements for spacecraft design.

lessons.name: Material Selection and Stress Analysis
lessons.description: Explore materials and perform stress analysis in spacecraft structures.

lessons.name: Vibration Control and Structural Dynamics
lessons.description: Manage vibrations, study dynamics for robust spacecraft structural design..

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Keplerian Orbits and Orbital Elements
lessons.description: Master Keplerian orbits, understand key orbital elements in design.

lessons.name: Orbital Maneuvers and Hohmann Transfers
lessons.description: Learn orbital maneuvers, Hohmann transfers for efficient spacecraft trajectories.

lessons.name: Perturbations and Orbit Corrections
lessons.description: Address perturbations, implement corrections for precise spacecraft orbital paths.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Requirements Definition and System Architecture
lessons.description: Establish requirements, design system architecture for spacecraft engineering.

lessons.name: Subsystem Integration and Verification
lessons.description: Integrate and verify subsystems for cohesive spacecraft functionality.

lessons.name: Reliability and Risk Management in Spacecraft Systems
lessons.description: Ensure reliability, manage risks in spacecraft systems engineering.
